title: Worst Vegetable
content:
this is a duplicate of the favorite vegetable poll, but 4 this 1 u r voting 4 the vegetable u hate most

so once again all u have 2 do is vote 4 which 1 u hate the most[url=http://www.ironmaiden.com][img]http://i11.photobucket.com/albums/a199/rorie1983/ironmaiden.jpg[/img][/url]

title: Re: Worst Vegetable
content:
Cauliflower, it smells like the sewers (I know what I'm talking about if it comes to that), and it probably tastes like that too.-----------------

title: Re: Worst Vegetable
content:
"I smells like the sewers"
Heh, it's amusing what a one missing 't' can do. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img]

Anyways, they all sound disgusting, but I'm not sure if I have tasted all of them. I'll choose egg plant.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Worst Vegetable
content: I've only ever had cauliflower, and it wasn't that bad.[center]<font color="MAROON">TOUGH GUYS DON'T FOLLOW FADS</font>[/center]

title: Re: Worst Vegetable
content:
Quite frankly I hate watercress, that and eggplant, and tomatoes.

Everything else is great.

[I love hunting down and killing the pitiful veggies, watching them scurry over the terrain before tearing them to pieces!]A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society
